site_name: Cuba Street Site, Land At North East Junction Of Manilla Street And Tobago Street, Tobago Street, London
description: Full description of parent app: Erection of single tower block accommodating a high density residential led development (Use Class C3) with ancillary amenity and play space, along with the provision of a flexible retail space at ground floor (Use Class E), the provision of a new publicly accessible park and alterations to the public highway.Minor Material Amendments to Planning permission Ref: PA/20/02128, Dated 21/12/22: Amendments include Variation of Conditions 2, 24 and 29 of planning permission PA/20/02128 (as amended by PA/23/02359) to increase the number of private homes and reduce the number of affordable homes, alongside reconfiguration of unit sizes and internal layouts.
